detaileddescription.para:
Connects an additional shortcut to a QAbstractButton. Works around the one shortcut limitation of the button's shortcut property.
button
QAbstractButton to assign shortcut to
shortcut
QKeySequence to use as shortcut

Copy a field of the currently selected entry of a view to the clipboard. Does nothing if nothing is selected.
column
Data column to extract from the model
role
Data role to extract from the model

memberdef.argsstring: (QWidget *parent, const QString &caption, const QString &dir, const QString &filter, QString *selectedSuffixOut)
memberdef.name: getSaveFileName

detaileddescription.para: Get save filename, mimics QFileDialog::getSaveFileName, except that it appends a default suffix when no suffix is provided by the user.

parameterdescription.para: Starting directory (or empty, to default to documents directory)
Filter specification such as "Comma Separated Files (*.csv)"
Pointer to return the suffix (file type) that was selected (or 0). Can be useful when choosing the save file format based on suffix.

memberdef.argsstring: (QWidget *parent, const QString &caption, const QString &dir, const QString &filter, QString *selectedSuffixOut)
memberdef.name: getOpenFileName

detaileddescription.para: Get open filename, convenience wrapper for QFileDialog::getOpenFileName.

parameterdescription.para: Starting directory (or empty, to default to documents directory)
Filter specification such as "Comma Separated Files (*.csv)"
Pointer to return the suffix (file type) that was selected (or 0). Can be useful when choosing the save file format based on suffix.

detaileddescription.para: Get connection type to call object slot in GUI thread with invokeMethod. The call will be blocking.

simplesect.para: If called from the GUI thread, return a Qt::DirectConnection. If called from another thread, return a Qt::BlockingQueuedConnection.

detaileddescription.para: Qt event filter that intercepts QEvent::FocusOut events for QLabel objects, and resets their `textInteractionFlags' property to get rid of the visible cursor.
This is a temporary fix of QTBUG-59514. */ class LabelOutOfFocusEventFilter : public QObject { Q_OBJECT
public: explicit LabelOutOfFocusEventFilter(QObject* parent); bool eventFilter(QObject* watched, QEvent* event) override; };

memberdef.name: calculateIdealFontSize

detaileddescription.para: Returns the distance in pixels appropriate for drawing a subsequent character after text.
In Qt 5.12 and before the QFontMetrics::width() is used and it is deprecated since Qt 5.13. In Qt 5.11 the QFontMetrics::horizontalAdvance() was introduced.
Writes to debug.log short info about the used Qt and the host system.
Call QMenu::popup() only on supported QT_QPA_PLATFORM.
Returns the start-moment of the day in local time.
QDateTime::QDateTime(const QDate& date) is deprecated since Qt 5.15. QDate::startOfDay() was introduced in Qt 5.14.

memberdef.argsstring: (Sender sender, Signal signal, Receiver receiver, Slot method, Qt::ConnectionType type=Qt::AutoConnection)
memberdef.name: ExceptionSafeConnect

detaileddescription.para: A drop-in replacement of QObject::connect function (see: https://doc.qt.io/qt-5/qobject.html#connect-3), that guaranties that all exceptions are handled within the slot.
NOTE: This function is incompatible with Qt private signals.
Utility functions used by the Bitcoin Qt UI.
